Well, that could depend on your situation. If you are raising taxes to pay for a new entitlement program than probably liberal but if you are doing it to balance your budget it is more conservative. Is Ron Paul a conservative? For the most part, yes, but his ideas are unrealistic. Is Mike Huckabee a conservative? Well, on some issues yes and others no. Is John McCain a conservative? Well, I haven't seen it yet.
